name: maggic-mlp-fs
title: MAGGIC-MLP Features
description: Set of extracted features for MAGGIC-MLP

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

sampling.description: Divide the population into one-year intervals.

secondaryTimePoint.name: lastRecordDate
secondaryTimePoint.description: The latest recorded end time from the patient's encounters.

feature.name: gender
feature.description: Gender of the patient

feature.name: age
feature.description: Age of the patient at reference point

feature.name: nyha
feature.description: The latest value of the New York Heart Assessment as LOINC Code

feature.name: value
feature.description: The average value recorded over the three years preceding the reference time point.

feature.name: value
feature.description: The average value recorded over the three years preceding the reference time point.

filter.name: heart_failure
filter.filter: icd10Codes.select($this.startsWith('I50') or $this.startsWith('I11.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.2') or $this.startsWith('I26.0') or $this.startsWith('I25.5') or $this.startsWith('I09.81') or $this.startsWith('I97.13')).anyTrue()

feature.name: occurred_prior_to_18_months
feature.description: Indicates whether the condition was diagnosed 18 months or more before the reference time point, corresponding to the criteria for 'Heart Failure (HF) ≥ 18 Months Prior.'

feature.name: has_chronic_obstructive_pulmonary_disease
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD).

feature.name: has_atrial_fibrillation
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Atrial Fibrillations.

feature.name: has_myocardial_infarction
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Myocardial Infarctions.

feature.name: has_pci
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI).

feature.name: has_cabg
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) Surgeries.

value.path: icd10Codes.select($this.startsWith('K40') or $this.startsWith('K41') or $this.startsWith('K42') or $this.startsWith('K43') or $this.startsWith('K44') or $this.startsWith('K45') or $this.startsWith('K46') or $this.startsWith('K47')).anyTrue()

feature.name: has_stroke
feature.description: Whether the patient has the strokes.

feature.name: has_diabetes
feature.description: Whether the patient has the diabetes.

feature.name: administered

filter.description: Find ACE Inhibitors / ARB Use medications.
filter.filter: medicationGroups.select($this = 'ACEI' or $this = 'ARB').anyTrue() or (medicationCodes.select($this.startsWith('C09AA') or $this.startsWith('C09BA') or $this.startsWith('C09BB02') or $this.startsWith('C09BB03') or $this.startsWith('C09BB04') or $this.startsWith('C09BB05') or $this.startsWith('C09BB06') or $this.startsWith('C09BB07') or $this.startsWith('C09BB08') or $this.startsWith('C09BB09') or $this.startsWith('C09BB010') or $this.startsWith('C09BB011') or $this.startsWith('C09BB012') or $this.startsWith('C09BX01') or $this.startsWith('C09BX02') or $this.startsWith('C09BX03') or $this.startsWith('C09BX04') or $this.startsWith('C09BX05') or $this.startsWith('C09CA') or $this.startsWith('C09DA') or $this.startsWith('C09DB') or $this.startsWith('C09DX01') or $this.startsWith('C09DX02') or $this.startsWith('C09DX03') or $this.startsWith('C09DX04') or $this.startsWith('C09DX05') or $this.startsWith('C09DX06') or $this.startsWith('C09DX07') or $this.startsWith('C09DX04')).anyTrue())

feature.name: administered
feature.description: Whether the medication administered.

feature.name: lvef
feature.description: The most recent left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) recorded prior to the reference time point.

feature.name: smoker
feature.description: Indicates whether the patient's most recent recorded smoking status, collected before the reference time point, classifies them as a current smoker. A value of 1 denotes a current smoker, while 0 represents either a former smoker or someone who has never smoked.

feature.name: months_to_death_or_last_record_date
feature.description: The number of months between the reference time point and the patient’s date of death (if known); otherwise, the number of months between the reference time point and the last known date of recorded activity related to the patient.

feature.name: deceased_in_12_months
feature.description: Mortality recorded within the 12 months following the reference time point.

feature.name: deceased_in_24_months
feature.description: Mortality recorded within the 24 months following the reference time point.

feature.name: deceased_in_36_months
feature.description: Mortality recorded within the 36 months following the reference time point.

feature.name: deceased_in_48_months
feature.description: Mortality recorded within the 48 months following the reference time point.

combinedFeature.name: maggic_total_score
combinedFeature.description: Sum of MAGGIC points incl. SBP×EF and Age×EF extras.
